attributes.action: Stop the Northern Ireland amnesty for killers
attributes.additional_details: Innocent victims have more than paid the price for peace in Northern Ireland, first with the lives of our loved ones then again with the prisoner release. It seems that it is alway innocent victims that are expected to pay the price! and here yet again we are being asked to give even more! we have NOTHING left to give Stop this injustice!
attributes.background: We DEMAND that Boris Johnson stop this offensive amnesty for killers of the Northern Ireland troubles.
